.panel[.panel-name[Load]

```{r}

  geom_point()
```

.panel[.panel-name[Load]

To install and load package we use following:

```{r eval = F}
install.packages("devtools") #install

library(devtools) #load

devtools::install_github("nm-training/rsetup")

```

]
